about.heading: Polish language teacher
about.paragraph.1: My name is Patrycja. I have been teaching Polish as a foreign language for 8 years and hold a PhD in the humanities (linguistics). I teach through play, using active methods and gamification. I cooperate with the School of Polish Language and Culture “Pollando” at the University of Białystok, Belsat TV, and local NGOs. I’m also an examiner for certification exams in Polish as a foreign language at the Białystok University of Technology. With the Podlasie Library in Białystok, I co-organize discussion meetings for foreigners and Poles — “Polish-Polish Conversations”, and with the “Window to the East” Foundation and the “Women’s Club” — a “Language Café” for women learning Polish.
about.more.interests: Research interests: Polish glottodidactics, methodology of teaching Polish as a first language, culture didactics.
about.more.publications: Selected publications: Lexiculture as a gateway to locality — using a hip-hop song in Polish classes (in: On the issues of language education, vol. 8…), Speaking through art… (in: Activation — innovation — inspiration in (glotto)didactics…), The linguistic image of Podlasie… (in: On the issues of language education, vol. 9…), Using local biographies… (Acta Universitatis Lodziensis… 2022, no. 29).
brand.title: Follow Polish
brand.paragraph: The name “Śledź polski” is a play on words. On one hand, “śledź” (herring) alludes to a characteristic regional pronunciation in Podlasie, emphasizing local identity in my teaching. On the other hand, “śledź” is the imperative of “to follow/track,” reflecting attentive observation of the Polish language and its nuances. This aligns with my Instagram account popularizing knowledge of Polish as a foreign language and with initiatives about Polish and Podlasie, e.g., “Polish-Polish Conversations” and “Podlasie Alphabet.”

services.0.title: Individual lessons
services.0.description: Individual lessons are a proposal tailored specifically for you, providing full attention and adaptation to your needs and goals.
services.1.title: Group lessons
services.1.description: Group lessons are intended for people who learn better through group work. Groups consist of up to 6 people. The classes focus on pair work, creative projects, conversations, and learning the language through games and activities.
services.2.title: Offer for companies and institutions
services.2.description: In addition to language courses, I also offer cultural workshops for foreigners and methodological training for beginner teachers of Polish as a foreign or second language.
services.3.title: Cultural workshops and language cafés
services.3.description: Events aimed at introducing participants to Polish and Podlasie culture and, as a result, enabling their integration with the local community. During language cafés, foreigners can improve their ability to speak freely on various topics.
